title: How to Make Obiad

steps.headline: Gather your bread.
steps.description: Place a piece of bread on a cutting board and flatten it out. Repeat this step with the other 5 pieces of bread.

steps.headline: Place each piece of bread into a blender.
steps.description: Add the milk and grapes to the blender. Blend the mixture until the result is a dough-like mixture. Don't over blend.

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350F.
steps.description: Form the dough into a ball. Grease a baking sheet and place the dough onto the baking sheet. Bake for 15 Minutes or until a light golden brown.

steps.headline: Allow the bread-like ball to cool for 10 minutes.
steps.description: Slice the bread into ⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) pieces. Keep the oven on, as it will be needed in a later step.

steps.headline: On each piece of newly formed piece of bread, add a layer of sour cream.
Next, add a layer of sauerkraut.
Finally, add a slice of Münster cheese and other additional toppings.
Place each Obiad onto a baking sheet and bake until the cheese is melted.
Garnish with freshly chopped parsley and enjoy.

text: Gather your bread. Place a piece of bread on a cutting board and flatten it out. Repeat this step with the other 5 pieces of bread. Place each piece of bread into a blender. Add the milk and grapes to the blender. Blend the mixture until the result is a dough-like mixture. Don't over blend. Preheat the oven to 350F. Form the dough into a ball. Grease a baking sheet and place the dough onto the baking sheet. Bake for 15 Minutes or until a light golden brown. Allow the bread-like ball to cool for 10 minutes. Slice the bread into ⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) pieces. Keep the oven on, as it will be needed in a later step. On each piece of newly formed piece of bread, add a layer of sour cream.  Next, add a layer of sauerkraut.  Finally, add a slice of Münster cheese and other additional toppings.  Place each Obiad onto a baking sheet and bake until the cheese is melted. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Garnish with freshly chopped parsley and enjoy.
